name: Blockbench 3D Scene
summary: A BBSCENE file is a 3D scene created by the Blockbench 3D model editor with the Preview Scene Customiser plugin installed. It contains information about a 3D scene, including the position, size, and faces of cubes (in plain text), and may include one or more .TGA or .PNG textures. Blockbench users with the Preview Scene Customiser plugin installed typically save scenes as BBSCENE files when creating and modifying scenes for video games.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
